comments.body: Since you're modifying all these tests anyway, and for the sake of consistency, could you replace the `advertise_addr` here with `"{{ansible_default_ipv4.address}}"`? I didn't know about this property when I wrote the test initially, and the default address could help make the tests more portable going forward.
